resources.string:
Thank you for beta testing snake 2!
 
 Since the tutorial isn't completed yet here's how to play:
 - Change the snake's direction by swiping or tapping the arrows
 - Avoid the walls
 - Eat the white mice to grow
 - Classic mode has levels that change every time you reach 3 feet
 - Arcade has a balanced random wall spawning algorithm that builds the challenge as you eat more mice
 
 This version includes:
 - Classic mode
 - Arcade mode
 - A terrain generator
 - Local high scores
 
 Please email any bugs or ideas to: snake2beta@byte-games.com
